title: sATshi lEdhanuchu
sahitya:
sAkSi lEdanucu sAdhimpakE satyasandhhha sadbhakta pAlaka

anupallavi

 viksa kAdulella navvarA jagat sAkSi vamsha nIradhi pUrNacandra

caraNam

 shakti nIyeDa niNDAra lEdA parAshakti brOva lEdA visayamandu 
virakti galgu shrI tyAgarAju nijabhakti nI veruga lEdA mAnavula
